name: Track Day (mscharf)
description:
Feedback, ideas, and support is greatly appreciated!

Leave your favorite tracks and you best time in the comments!

Input

Controller is recommended, but keyboard or mouse/keyboard can be used.

Time Trials

Race against the clock in 3 time trial campaigns. Earn awards for achieving quick times on each level. Each level has its own time set by the developer. Once you have completed a track, you will be able to race against your fastest attempt. Master the control of your car and be the quickest on the track!

Future Plans

Multiplayer modes: current ideas include car chase, time trials, lap endurance.

Track Creator: create you Home Track and set your best time. Race on other player's Home Track and crush their times to increase you rankings.
